snippet: Elan, the embattled Irish drug company, said on Monday that an unsolicited takeover bid by Royalty Pharma had lapsed because Elan’s shareholders had voted in favor of a share buyback plan.
abstract: Elan, the embattled Irish drug company, said on Monday that an unsolicited takeover bid by Royalty Pharma had lapsed because Elan’s shareholders had voted in favor of a share buyback plan.

headline.main: Battle for Elan in Doubt After Share Buyback Plan Is Approved
